item.title: OLA ART Shut The Box Game Wooden for 2-6 Players, Wooden Board Table Math Game with 16 Dice, Board Game for Kids Adults, Family Classroom Home Party or Pub
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) What’s the SHUT THE BOX: Wooden shut the box game is a classic traditional dice game that offers endless fun. With a new upgrade that can be played by up to 6 player at same time, complete with 1 to 10 number combinations, 4 (wood) + 12 (colored plastic) dice, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:44:23 UTC – Details)



What’s the SHUT THE BOX: Wooden shut the box game is a classic traditional dice game that offers endless fun. With a new upgrade that can be played by up to 6 player at same time, complete with 1 to 10 number combinations, 4 (wood) + 12 (colored plastic) dice, it is one of the most popular math games
Origin of The Game: The history of this game is not much more than vague folklore — No one really knows when and where the game originated. It may have originated in Normandy, France around the 12th Century. It is believed to have been a popular game amongst fur trappers of the Hudson Bay Company in the 19th Century. It is said to have also been popular among sailors and fishermen. This centuries old game is great for teaching kids basic addition and subtraction. It helps to build mental math skills and is really fun to play
Endless Fun for Every Occasion：This classic pub game is a great addition to any game night of holiday get-together! Gather your friends and family around this addicting dice game, and put your math and strategy skills to the test. Whether you make some friendly wagers or just play for fun, Shut the Box is sure to entertain
Premium Craftsmanship: The wooden shut the box game is made of solid natural wood which is durable and sturdy. Premium Felt ensure the lower noise when dice hit the board so that you can focus on the game and hours of fun while playing
Multiple Ways to Play: There are different ways of playing Shut the Box. Read the instructions or you find and learn about options online by searching “How to Play Shut the Box” or “Shut the Box Game Variations”.

4.5
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:44:23 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:55 UTC – Details)

From the brand

WOOD CITY Shut the Box Game

Shut the Box Game for Party, Family

About us

WOOD CITY aims to provide high-quality wooden early learning intelligence toys for all young children, by researching early childhood development, growth, practice.

We strive to achieve a collective vision of providing the best and up-to-date educational wooden toys for all young children, and commit to ensuring that they thrive and learn in a community where they reach their full potential and develop their intellect and imagination.

Shut the Box for 6 Players

Shut the Box for 4 Players

Fast Sling Puck Game

Upgraded Version for 6 Players: This shut the box game set designed for up to 6 players includes hexagonal game board lined with felt and completed with 1-10 numbers, instructions, 16 dice (12 colored, 4 original wood color). Kids and adults can enjoy the deal of strategy and luck and hours of fun while playing.
Learning While Playing: Simple math are required to play the shut-the-box dice game. Kids could improve basic mathematical addition skills, exercise logical thinking, problem solving abilities and enhance interpersonal communication and build good relationships with their friends. With gift box package design, this shut the box game set is a perfect gift for kids.
Blast Quick Game: No more time for a complicated game? Choose our wooden shut the box game. You can play a game for as long or as short a time as is available with 6 People. You can also customized rules to play more round.
Portable Traditional Game for Different Occasions: This 6-way close the box dice game is a portable and easy to carry wooden board game. It can be play in many different occasions, perfect for family, classroom, parties, pub etc. to have a great time with your family members, friends, classmates.
Premium Craftsmanship: The wooden shut the box game is made of solid natural wood which is durable and sturdy. Felt surface pad could reduce the noise when dice hit the board so that you can focus on the game. If you have any issues with our shut the box game, do not hesitate to get in touch with us and we will be more than happy to ensure you have a satisfying buying experience.

SHUT THE BOX GAME WOODEN for 6 PLAYERS

  • Shut the Box is a particular dice game, our upgraded version can be played up to 6 players.
  • The history of the game could be over 250 years and originated in Normandy.
  • In pubs, Shut the Box is traditionally played as a gambling game, but we don’t advocate it generally.
  • Nowadays, it becomes a more and more popular board game during family activities, parties, and festivals.
  • Either for social and family entertainment or as an excellent tool for kids to learn math calculations.
  • The player rolls the dice, adds up the numbers, and then puts down the pieces that have the sum.
  • Enjoy the luck of the game as well as exercising the ability of divergent thinking to find more combinations.

PERFECT TABLETOP GAME

  • Whether it’s a game at a party to liven things up, or a bar gambling to punish the loser for drinking.
  • It can be both considered as our first choice of tool.
  • Portable, and can play with several friends at the same time to increase the play ability.
  • Not only are there various play rules, but also can through personal luck to create thrilling moments.




Shut the Box Wooden Game for 4 Players
Car Ramp Toy for Toddler
Toddler Fine Motor Skills Toys, Bee to Hive Matching Game
Battery Operated Train for Wooden Train Set
Wooden Train Set, Battery Operated Trains & Wooden Train Tracks

(as of Nov 30,2022 03:47:08 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The Ultimate Wall Organizer

Designed to look good and work even better, this hanging file organizer by NEATERIZE is the perfect solution for narrow or small spaces where desk space is limited. Made from sturdy metal, each of the four divider pockets can be used as a mail holder or wall file organizer for the home or office. The bottom ledge can be used to hold pencils, pens, sticky notepads, or even as a technology docking station for your smartphone.

The colorful options also make this a great way to organize kids’ school work, drawings, coloring books, and more and are a must-have for teachers. Get one for every room in your home and be amazed at how easy organization becomes! NEATERIZE makes it possible!

ORGANIZE IT ALL: From mails to notes, bills to books everything you need is accessible yet protected DAZZLING COLORS: With 7 unique colors to choose from, you can express your creativity and style. EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Wall screws are included. Start organizing it right away with easy installation!

★ THE COMPLETE WALL ORGANIZER FOR OFFICE: Everything you need for a mail organizer including the wall mount, all in one place. Super easy installation. Start using this wall file organizer right away to hold documents, files, notebooks and more all in one place for easy access. Perfect for the home office, the classroom or anywhere that you need a large wall organizer that’s durable and can hold serious weight without falling, bowing, bending or breaking.
★ THE ULTIMATE WALL HANGING FILE FOLDER ORGANIZER: No assembly needed. Just hang and use right away. This hanging mail organizer is attractive enough to use as a file holder wall mounted or as a standing file organizer if you wish. Comes in your choice of 3 colors, making it a great way to organize bills, tablets, notebooks, portfolios, photos, coloring books, magazines and so much more. Ideal as a hanging desk organizer too, with ample storage for your phone or digital devices underneath.
★ FITS IN TIGHT SPACES: Measures 12.5(l) x 4(w) x 16(h) inches but fits easily in tight or narrow spaces. Multi-use all paper holder for all your documents. The tray underneath also holds pens, notepads, staplers, bookmarks and more within easy reach, making it great for sorting mail, bills, photos, files, papers, magazines and more. Also great for storing cookbooks and recipes in the kitchen. The possibilities are virtually endless!
★ MULTI COLOR, MULTI PURPOSE: This hanging wall file organizer comes in three colors; professional black, white and grey. They are great for homeschooling or for use in the classroom as a vertical fil organizer Simple divider sections keep items in this vertical file organizer separated yet easy to reach when needed. Get rid of paper clutter and keep your space neat, tidy and organized with this all-in-one hanging wall organizer!
★ NEVER LOSE A BILL AGAIN: This sturdy wall file holder makes a great wall mail organizer and is durable enough to hold a considerable number of bills, papers, magazines and more. Organize incoming and outgoing mail, bills and other documents while keeping papers orderly. No more disorganized stacks of paper or an overflowing inbox. With NEATERIZE on your side, you’ve got it all accessible and under control.

The Ultimate Wall Organizer

Designed to look good and work even better, this hanging file organizer by NEATERIZE is the perfect solution for narrow or small spaces where desk space is limited. Made from sturdy metal, each of the four divider pockets can be used as a mail holder or wall file organizer for the home or office. The bottom ledge can be used to hold pencils, pens, sticky notepads, or even as a technology docking station for your smartphone.

The colorful options also make this a great way to organize kids’ school work, drawings, coloring books, and more and are a must-have for teachers. Get one for every room in your home and be amazed at how easy organization becomes! NEATERIZE makes it possible!

  • ORGANIZE IT ALL: From mails to notes, bills to books everything you need is accessible yet protected
  • DAZZLING COLORS: With 7 unique colors to choose from, you can express your creativity and style.
  • EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Wall screws are included. Start organizing it right away with easy installation!

Pin Boards for Walls

Detail Specifications
● Safe and odourless.
● Clean and clutter-free edges.
● Keep things handy, Pretty Decoration.

Package Content
● 4 Piece of pin boards for walls.
● 40 candy-colored push pins for daily use.
If you want to bring a pop of color and dimension to your home without changing too much, or cover up imperfections in an accessible fashion, you can not miss this small bulletin board set.
Choose different push pin board strips for several spots while blending into your decor. More possibilities than a traditional cork board. A good way to leave your messages, display your collections, pictures and impress everyone who comes to visit it!
Pin reminders, notes in a variety of places so you won’t miss any important dates, tasks. The 13”×2”×0.35” cute bulletin board allows you to make full use of small space. Like the door, closet, refrigerator, bookcase, mirror, etc.
Easy to remove the mini bulletin board without ruining your walls. Perfect for a rental property or public place like classroom, office, dorm room, apartment complex.
Coming 4 bulletin board strips and 40 push pins in one package. The length of the needle is shorter than the thickness of felt strip, won’t protrude from the wall. Not recommended on textured walls.

INSPIRATIONAL WALL ART: Our unframed motivational quotes wall decor is originally designed to create a joyful and positive atmosphere in Office, Bedroom, Living Room, Gym, Class. Botanical plant design makes this black and white art more elegant and beautiful; you will be completely in love with the way they look, starting your day in a good mood when you are looking at this simple inspirational wall art.
QUALITY PRINT: Laser printing process, these motivational wall art sets are clearly displayed on bright white card stock paper, feature clean design and high resolution; botanical watercolor designs printed on 400 GSM sturdy, white stiff card stock with a high gloss UV coating. They are vibrant, durable, and dust resistant for long-term use.
UNFRAMED: Please note that our art sets come UNFRAMED. You get a set of four 8″x 10″ Prints, so you can choose the perfect frames to match your own style and the room decoration. Our inspiration art will fit well in your standard 8″ x 10″ frames without mat or larger frames with 8″ x 10″ mat. Framed or hung with clips are also great ways to show off your beautiful prints.
EASY & THOUGHTFUL GIFT: Our positive affirmations wall art prints are packaged with beautiful and high-quality Gift Packaging to make them ready to give and to protect your arts from any possible damage in transit. They are perfect gifts for you loved one. Please enjoy these little things!

From the brand

Who Are We?

SUBMATCHES was founded in 2013, Focus on household goods, research and development, design, production, sales, e-commerce operation and industrial chain system construction, provide one-stop home storage tools for people all over the world, helping people improve their living environment, improve the efficiency of living space utilization, and create a warm and comfortable home and office environment

Unique & Creative Organizer

Best-Selling Storage Bins

Best-Selling Desk Organizer

Our Mission

Delivering a sophisticated home lifestyle, enhance the happiness of home life of hundreds of millions of families.

Make Your Home More Neat, Minimalist and Comfortable

Selected the best designers in the industry to find the product design that connects life and art, selected luxury materials, set up high quality and advanced production workshops, and strictly control quality standards.

User Experience Comes First

Create more life experience of user value, continue to meet the user’s pursuit of beauty with creative and unique design, to create a sophisticated life

【STRONG SELF-ADHESIVE DRAWER】 The hidden drawer under desk can apply to various occasions such as office,kitchen, living room, bedroom, study rooms, dressing rooms. Due to the transparent plastic, it’s easy to access whatever you need at a glance. Help to organize your desk and save space. Convenient to clean it as well.
【STRONG LOAD BEARING】The desk drawer attachment is able to bear weight up to about 11lbs and withstand for years of daily use . No worry about falling off. It’s super sticky. The drawers can be repeatedly attached to the underside of desk and slide open/close pretty smoothly.
【LARGER CAPACITY】 The dimension of 2-layers desk drawer organizer is 9.25X7.95X6.1inch, so it can hold lots of items with different sizes, like calculators, pencils, books, smartphones, earphones, cosmetics, forks, underwear, towels, etc. So well to free space on the desk and keep it clean and organized.
【EASY TO INSTALL】 Drill& hole- free self-adhesive under desk drawer is easy to install on smooth wall with two tapes. It perfectly protects your desk or closet from damaging. It arrives with two adhesive strips, press the adhesive tape a bit make sure the tape adheres strongly to the surface.
【SUPERIOR QUALITY】 Under desk drawer slide out is made of environmental-friendly ABS+benzene material and stronger adhesives, it is thickened, wear-resistant, water proof and dust-proof.BETTER USE IT AFTER 24 HOURS FOR BETTER ADHESIVE EFFECT, IF IT WAS BROKEN WHEN YOU RECEIVE OR FELL OFF AFTER APPLY IT, PLS FEEL FREE TO CONTACT US, WE WILL REFUND YOUR MONEY OR SEND NEW ONE.

Production

  • The self-adhesive storage drawer underneath desk is widely applicable in living room, office, study room, kitchen, bathroom, etc.
  • Large capacity with double layers is ideal to hold a large amount of items as you like, easy and quick to grab what you need inside. Perfect to declutter your desk and won’t take up desktop space.
  • Superior material allows you to place heavy items without falling off, durable and sturdy for years, water proof and dust-proof as well. The smooth surface will not hurt your hands.
  • It is a easy and smart way to have a personalized organizing space under desk!

Read more

The hidden drawer pencil tray is very convenient for the underside of the table, paste them anywhere as you need to hold various items.

Bedroom

  • Our hidden self-adhesive drawer helps you organize your underwear, socks and so on.
  • It prevents dust from entering inside, much more clean and healthy to your healthy.

Study Room

  • You can easily spot whatever you want inside at a glance due to its transparency.
  • Greatly save your time to get your work completed.

Office

  • No need digging. No messy any more on your desk or closet.
  • This is a smart way to have a personalized organizing space under desk!

Read more

Large Capacity

With two layers, and even two packs as you need, it can hold lots of items with different sizes, like not only calculators, pencils, books, staplers, notes, but also eyeglasses, smartphones, earphones, cosmetics, forks, underwear, towels and so on. So well to free space on the desk and keep it clean and organized.

Unique Features

Load Bearing Capacity

Our product is able to bear weight up to about 10lbs and withstand for years of daily use .

No worry falling off. It’s super sticky. The drawers can still attach and slide in and out pretty smoothly without issues.

  • [Free Drills] Attached securely and easily! No need to drill holes into the desk with no-tracing pasting.
  • [Easy Installation] Just peel the top paper off and attach. Make sure the surface you’re attaching it to is flat and clean, and the space under desk is spacious enough to hold it.
  • [ high quality] Made of ABS+ benzene material and stronger adhesives, it is thickened, wear-resistant and water proof and dust-proof.

Read more

Installation Step

Step One

(Before installation, wipe the wet, oil, dirt, wax and other items on the desktop before sticking it)

Peel off the surface layer of the tape

Step Two

Paste double sided tapes on the back and press hard on it.

Step Three

Peel off the surface layer of each tape

Step Four

Paste the back side of the tape to the smooth bottom of the desk. Press up a little bit. Better use it after 24 hours for better effect.

COLORFUL LINED: The new fashion comes with lines, 6 pads, 3×3 inch, 6 different colors with black auxiliary wire transparent clearly visible sticky notes. (300 sheets)
FRIENDLY HELPFUL HINTS: In order to get a better user’s experience, we recommend you to use pencils, ballpoint pens, oil-based markers, （Not recommended to use pens, water-based pens, gel pens, common markers, unless you can wait for handwriting to dry after using water-based pen. Do not wipe handwriting immediately)
EXTENSIVE USE: These new lined transparent sticky notes are popular and can be used for everything from notes, daily home tips, classification management notes pads, study & reading annotating message reminders, research & business meetings memos, and more.
FEATURE OF NOTES：Small and lightweight, you can carry it everywhere. Such as:Universities, offices, schools, libraries, LABS, parties, etc. The black lines help you write neatly and make note-taking look good.
HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS: Made of high transparency & can write PET material allows you to see the text and information on the bottom when pasted on books, notebooks, computers, notes, etc. It’s your work, study and scientific research daily life supplies.
